summary: This bill, the 'Preventing Pretrial Gun Purchases Act,' aims to prevent individuals subject to pretrial release orders that prohibit firearm possession from purchasing firearms. It amends the Gun Control Act of 1968, clarifying the definition of "pretrial release order," and modifies sections related to background checks. Furthermore, the bill authorizes grants to states and tribes to report information about such orders to the National Instant Criminal Background Check System (NICS), with allocated funding of $25 million annually from 2026-2030.
